title: Downloaded copyright software, didn't know it was haram, what to do now? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: is asking about downloading copyrighted material that he did not know of and now he came to know that it is halam so what should he do the answer is to remove it to delete it do i have to seek forgiveness from the owners the answer is no once you delete it then there is no harm done and you would be repenting correctly to allah
